bibl.title: Early Hellenistic Coinage. From the Accession of Alexander to the Peace of Apamea (336-188 B.C.). Edited by Philip GRIERSON and Ulla WESTERMARK.
bibl.note: See pp. 63-70: Egypt and its Neighbours [336-c. 280]; - 100-111: The Ptolemies, c. 283-200.
MØRHOLM Otto (The late), Early Hellenistic Coinage. From the Accession of Alexander to the Peace of Apamea (336-188 B.C.). Edited by Philip GRIERSON and Ulla WESTERMARK.
Cambridge, Cambridge University Press, 1991, 8°, xxii-273 pp., 3 tabl., 3 figg., 8 cartes et 45 pll. ISBN 0-521-39504-6. £60.
